#include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
 
    int minJumps(int arr[], int n)
    {
    int *jumps = new int[n]; 
    int min;
    
    jumps[n-1] = 0;
    int i, j;
  
    for (i = n-2; i >=0; i--)
    {
  
		if (arr[i] == 0)
			jumps[i] = INT_MAX;
		
		else if (arr[i] >= n - i - 1)
			jumps[i] = 1;
		else
		{
			min = INT_MAX; 
			
			for (j = i+1; j < n && j <= arr[i] + i; j++)
			{
				if (min > jumps[j])
					min = jumps[j];
			}

		if (min != INT_MAX)
			jumps[i] = min + 1;
		else
			jumps[i] = min; 
		}
	}
	return jumps[0];
}
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
		cin>>n;
		int arr[10000];
		int i;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>arr[i];
		printf("%d\n", minJumps(arr, n-1));
    }
    return 0;
    }
